summary: Adds a new npc/follower to the game, Kara Valentia, related to Carlotta and Mila Valentia of Whitrun.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds the npc/follower, Kara Valentia to whiterun. She is related to Carlotta Valentia by being her daughter and related to Mila Valentia by being her sister. She works at the Skyforge as a apprentice(8-3), patrols Whiterun(4-6), goes to the bannered mare(7-10), and the rest of the time is at home(Carlotta\'s House). You can recruit her at any time and is classified under combatscout, meaning she is good at 1 handed swords and bows. She wears the wench dress when she is following you and wears eleven armor when she does. I gave her a steel sword and sheild and elven bow to not be overpowering, she is also essential.

I made this character as a way for me to pratice making npc\'s/followers for my other mod that brings cave story characters into the game(link below). 

Requirements:
Apachi Skyhair: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168
You MUST have apachi skyhair, otherwise your character will appear bald.

Recommended:
Remodeled Armor CBBEv3:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004
Better Females by Bella: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
Not needed, but if you want her like what i have in the screenshots, these are the mods i used.

Other Mods:
Cave story: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15266
Katsumi Aiko: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16840

Please post any bugs you find.

[s]Planned updates:
-More npc\'s/followers
-hopefully traveling npc\'s on horseback to other towns for jobs.[/s]
[b]Going to make separate pages for each of my follower mods, unless I get to many then I\'ll start putting them all on one page.[/b]

Credits:
Apachii for ApachiiSkyhair
author: MegamanOmega91
